column1: Hey, I wanted to talk. I feel like we’re growing apart, and it’s best we go our separate ways.
This isn’t easy, but I need to be honest. I don’t see this working out anymore.
You deserve someone who can give you 100%, and I don’t think I can do that right now.
I respect you a lot, but I don’t think we’re on the same page anymore.
This isn’t because of anything you did, I just feel like we both need something different.
